title: Brices Cross Roads National Battlefield Site: Park Home
body: Winning the Battle, Losing the War  The Confederate victory at Brices Cross Roads was a significant victory for Major General Nathan Bedford Forrest, but its long term effect on the war proved costly for the Confederates. Brices Cross Roads is an excellent example of winning the battle, but losing the war.              Things to Do   There is more to Brices Cross Roads than just the monument site.
